title: Chocolate Peanut Biscuits
abstract:
We were off to Bright for our annual family long
weekend, pledging that we’d buy as much as we could in
that town to support these communities that rely on tourism
and who have been so severely hit by the bushfires.

pars:
We were off to Bright for our annual family long
weekend, pledging that we’d buy as much as we could in
that town to support these communities that rely on tourism
and who have been so severely hit by the bushfires.

But, we ALWAYS have to take Perry’s snags – that’s
written in concrete. And I like to take some home-made
biscuits. This is what I made.

method:
Add melted butter and beaten eggs and sugar
to dry ingredients. Mix well and add peanuts.
